message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I think it's a great deal for you considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm trying to save some money here.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $120? It's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm getting close to your original offer, but I'd like to shave off a few more dollars.
